* BrightBlade stayed on her knees, she didn't dare look up for fear of a 
swift cuff along side the head from Hell Beast.
She could feel Gangon near to her but didn't know why he insisted in being 
present while she was questioned by Hell Beast?
She sighed slantly, soon she would know the answer to that question as well 
as others...all in time.*
